title: 양보와 조건 혼합
description: 양보와 조건 혼합을 연습합니다. CONCESSION-CONDITION-MIX 패턴을 활용하여 고급 영어 표현을 익힙니다.
examples: Even if it costs a lot, we should try.
Whether or not it rains, the event will continue.
No matter how hard it gets, don't give up.
learning_points: complex-condition 관련 고급 표현과 실용적 활용

sentences.en: Even if it costs a lot, we should try.

sentences.kr: 비가 오든 안 오든 행사는 계속됩니다.
sentences.en: Whether or not it rains, the event will continue.
No matter how hard it gets, don't give up.
Whatever the outcome, we did our best.
Whoever opposes, we will proceed with the plan.
However long it takes, we will complete it.
By whatever means, we will achieve our goal.
Wherever we go, we will stay in touch.
